Text: Can you include Ultimate Spider-Man #116 and Sensational Spider-Man #41 in your next update? They come out tomorrow, thanks!

Thanks, you're the best. 
Keep these babies comin'! :)
Sad to say, I have decided to retire.  This is my last official "Comic Pack".  Thanks for all of your support.
And also, thanks for all you've given.
Hello SBM, is there any word of the rest of Fangoria's bump being released. Excellent torrents as usual, keep up the good work. Thanks
I've just noticed the above comment from SBM. That's sad news. Good luck and cheers for all the good stuff.
I don't know how to open this, can you please help me.

sbm nooooooooooooooo!

that's too bad. Any reason in particular? I hope it's not because of some dumbass posters who don't appreciate what they're given.

Either way, thanks alot for your comics, you've been a comic torrent god on here...especially since demonoid is no more :-(
Thank you for your work I know several people who buy many new titles at their local comic store because of it.
Damn it sbm! You were doing one hell of a job here! Now where am I going to find all this stuff? Where do you guys get them from? ( I'm from eastern Europe so no comic book store for me )
For those of you that have downloaded my comics in the past, I gave you the name of the web  site for you to find Comics.  Just read the comments sections of the comic's property... you'll find it.
I just checked like 5 of your comics, I can't find it :(
Oh okay, isohunt had it, thanks!

are you going to continue to host the packs? 
Thanks for getting me back into comic books.
